name: Prototype (itch) (Game Dev Dave)
description:
Prototype was a solo game project completed as part of my Game Design university degree.  Uploading here so that a playable version can be included in my portfolio for those interested, though anyone else who wants to play it is welcome to do so.

I'd like to expand on the development, though given my increased skills and knowledge after completing that class I'd start from scratch rather then update this project.
